content: at neck edge fasten_off remaining 16 st cut yarn work second side of neck likewise left front with kiwi cc ch33 turn ch2 dcfl across row for 2 row cut yarn switch to anemone mc join yarn and work 12 row in dcfl at 14 cm high start armhole shaping slip_stitch first 4 st ch2 work rest of row in dcfl work even in dcfl next 6 row until piece measures 20 cm at 20 cm high shape neck slip_stitch first 7 st work remaining 22 st in dcfl next 6 row work in dcfl skipping 1 st at neck edge = skip 1 st at end of row or slip_stitch 1 at beg of row at 26 cm high fo remaining 16 st and cut yarn right front work as for right side reversing shaping sleeves make2 with kiwi cc ch41 turn row1 ch2 dcfl across row2 ch2 2 dcfl in first st dcfl across until last st 2 dcfl in last st = increase 1 at each end cut yarn switch to anemone mc join yarn next work in dcfl increasing one st at each end of row 4 6 9 12 & 15 you have 53 st work even for 3 more row until sleeve measures 18 cm fo and cut yarn finishing sew sleeve to top of armhole easing to fit sew armhole castoff sections to equal length along the armhole end of the sleeve side edges then sew remaining side and sleeve seams and shoulder seams go along all cardigan borders with spike cluster edging using whichever color contrasting the one used for that section of the cardi adding 2 little ties on each front side as you go as follows beginning at the top front neck corner of the cardigan and working downwards chain 16 turn slip_stitch 15 continuing down in spike cluster egding along front side for 20 sts then make a second tie likewise reverse instructions for opposite side going up towards neck corner kitty rattle toy will be worked in the round except for ears at the end make 2 similar pieces start each round with ch1 and end each round with slip_stitch in first single_crochet of round to join round 1 with kiwi cc chain 5 slip_stitch into first chain to join round round 2 2 single_crochet in each chain you have 10 st
